headline: Analyst Upgrades Recast Albemarle As Cost Discipline Resets Lithium Footprint
summary: Analysts have issued major upgrades on Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) following the company’s decision to idle its Kemerton lithium hydroxide plant. The upgrades come alongside cost saving initiatives that aim to tighten operations and prioritize higher returning assets. These moves are being interpreted as a reset of Albemarle’s operating footprint in the lithium sector, with implications for future earnings power. Albemarle is a major lithium producer with a key role in supplying materials for...
